title: Where is the iPad section?
message: I am troubleshooting what I believe to be a possible signature failure on iPad 6tg Gen units.   It is a backlight issue.   I don't have a subscription to iPad ReHab.   I used to but it was not helpful so I canx it.  Not sure where to go for iPad issues.   Seems like a secret community.

title: Where is the iPad section?
message: Don't have one. If you're talking about the intermittent backlight fault, it appears to be an issue when the CPU gets too hot it shuts off backlight. We saw about 30+ at once for the same issue tried multiple different things (coils, diodes, filters, etc.) and nothing seemed to fix the issue.

title: Where is the iPad section?
message:
It a strange one. Power on without battery you get a apple logo. If you give it the battery before it figures out there is not one the back light stays on and works. You can even hit power on and off "not hard boot" and it comes on and off normally.

Boot it with battery and it also boots but no back light. Only way to trick back light on is to boot no battery.
Check out this video and tell me if you fought the same thing.

[URL]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tk7kiyPY95w&t=191s[/URL]
